mapper.insert: insert into tumor_puncture( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, record_time, oper_way, operation_process, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{recordTime}, #{operWay}, #{operationProcess}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update tumor_puncture set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, record_time = #{recordTime}, oper_way = #{operWay}, operation_process = #{operationProcess}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
